ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, nothing to get too worked up about... at least they actually fixed it and the Symphonic Saber. Isn t it typical that they can fix a song that s only been
ygData.messageBody:
Well, nothing to get too worked up about... at least they actually fixed it
and the Symphonic Saber.

Isn't it typical that they can fix a song that's only been in the game for
two months and was only recently discovered as 'buggy' but they *still*
haven't addressed the problems with songs that have been broken since last
year?

Kinda makes you wonder if they only fixed it because they were able to
change a '+' to a '-'. ;)

-KS


>LOL i didn't think of that, but funny =)

>Shada

>> Am I the only one that is upset that they can't even take 2
>> seconds to hit
>> Rokenn's Site and look up the name of the goddamned song?
>>
>> Draelon
